knimeNode.name: Test File System Connection
knimeNode.shortDescription: Opens a file system connection to a configurable backend file system.

fullDescription.intro:
This node allows to execute the same testflow for a variety of different file systems. This node initiates a connection to a file system. The type of file system as well as its configuration is defined by the fs-test.properties file. This file can be supplied in two ways:
By putting it into the root of your KNIME workspace
By setting an environment variable called "KNIME_FS_TEST_PROPERTIES", which specifies the file.

ports.outPort: A file system connection which is supposed to be tested.
